description: This file defines a Redux toolkit slice called 'filterSlice' for managing filtering options in an animal behavior analytics platform frontend. It includes state definitions, initial state setup with date calculations, reducers for updating filter parameters, and exports for actions and reducer.

methods.name: setBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Reducer to set selected behavior types in the filter state.

methods.name: setMaxDuration
methods.description: Reducer to set the maximum duration filter.

methods.name: setDateRange
methods.description: Reducer to set the start and end date range for filtering.

methods.name: setDateRangePreset
methods.description: Reducer to set date range presets ('7d', '30d', 'today') based on current date.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Reducer to reset all filter parameters to their default values.

ctags.name: clearAll
ctags.pattern: /^export const { setBehaviorTypes, setMaxDuration, setDateRange, setDateRangePreset, clearAll } = /

ctags.name: setBehaviorTypes
ctags.pattern: /^export const { setBehaviorTypes, setMaxDuration, setDateRange, setDateRangePreset, clearAll } = /

ctags.name: setDateRange
ctags.pattern: /^export const { setBehaviorTypes, setMaxDuration, setDateRange, setDateRangePreset, clearAll } = /

ctags.name: setDateRangePreset
ctags.pattern: /^export const { setBehaviorTypes, setMaxDuration, setDateRange, setDateRangePreset, clearAll } = /

ctags.name: setMaxDuration
ctags.pattern: /^export const { setBehaviorTypes, setMaxDuration, setDateRange, setDateRangePreset, clearAll } = /
